# Planar Ally, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[see text]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (offerings worth 2,500 gp plus payment), DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Up to three called outsiders, totaling no more than 18 HD, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear.

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 320

This spell functions like *[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar ally]]*, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18. The creatures agree to help you and request your return payment together.
